req_description: Implement secure payment processing with multiple payment providers (Stripe, PayPal, Square). Include PCI-DSS compliance, tokenization, and real-time fraud detection. Support for credit cards, debit cards, and digital wallets.

Build centralized authentication service with OAuth 2.0/OIDC support. Implement JWT-based session management, multi-factor authentication (MFA), single sign-on (SSO) capabilities, and role-based access control (RBAC).

Redesign order processing workflow to support real-time inventory synchronization, multi-warehouse fulfillment, automated order routing, and integration with shipping carriers (FedEx, UPS, USPS). Include order tracking and notification system.

Build end-to-end claims processing system for healthcare members. Support electronic claim submission (EDI 837), real-time eligibility verification, automated adjudication rules engine, and EOB generation. Integrate with provider networks and payer systems.

Develop comprehensive provider directory with search capabilities, network tier display, and real-time availability. Include provider credentialing workflow, quality metrics display, and patient review integration. Support for telehealth provider filtering.

Build centralized notification platform supporting email, SMS, push notifications, and in-app messaging. Include template management, delivery tracking, preference center, and compliance with CAN-SPAM and TCPA regulations. Support batch and real-time delivery.

Create self-service analytics platform with customizable dashboards, real-time KPI tracking, and automated report generation. Support data visualization, drill-down capabilities, and export to multiple formats. Include role-based data access and audit logging.
